title: Build a PORNO BLOCK app on Android  for Google Play Store, along with Online Control Panel on Linux platform
desc: Hi there!Attached is the Detailed Description of what this app entails. This would need to be an ANDROID App with Online Control Panel, where the Superuser would get reports and would be able to control the App on the device Remotely. Please let me know if you have experience in such  app. Please confirm that the Price and Time you entered in the project are correct. thank you, and i look forward to working with you, Please also describe the milestones and when will they be released.    thank you, Project Manager, VALPlease review the Attached Uploaded Document, Project Requirements, It is requirements for this project, and is a legal contract, the contractor would need to fulfill the requirements in full, before we release the milestone,We will release 65% of milestone, when the Android app is created to our requirements, along with the ONLINE CONTROL PANEL with all Features, that are created with our requirements.We will then Release Remaining 35% milestone funds, after you do the Revisions that we request for the Final Copy, when the App is accepted on the Google Play Store and everything functions properly.The accepted Contractor also promises to provide us Free Support and Revisions for first 30 days, and then we will pay $10 an hour, for any  issues that are need to be dealt with,thank you for your attention. please submit your bids along with a list of the ANDROID apps that you had done.

title: Write an iPad application
desc: We are a fire extinguisher checking company as well as covering other areas of health and safety.  We would like to make our technicians and administrators job easy by creating an app that can be used onsite on an ipad for jobs to mark up what extinguishers/products have been checked for it then to be turned into an invoice and a report.  Both the invoice and report can be logged on the app and the adminstrator can then check this once a day from their computer and send them to the customer when they have been double checked. We see this app as an alternative to email and paper so that mistakes aren't made and drop down options are created to make it easier. We also would like to have this as a starting point to then add on other options of what the app can do for us as the busines grows and changes.

title: Designing landing page mobile application
desc: This is a mobile application and it  is designed to share the status of specific location (restaurant, coffee, university, etc.) between one to one user through short conversation. Ex: assume an user staying in his home and he is planning to go to specific restaurant but he does not know if that restaurant is crowded or not. So, he will access this application as offsite user (two kinds of users, onsite user, where the user is inside the location and offsite user, the user who accessing the application outside the location. ), then he will send a message saying what he wants to all users inside that location. Then one of the user inside that location will reply to help offsite user and conversation box will opened between them to get exactly what offsite user wants with limited conversation.The design should include the followingThe design should include the following1. Logo of the application2. each page should be redesigned.2. the design should not be complicated.3. Proof reading for the language.4. Include animation as need, especially for  three introduction page.5. Any sketch, logo , picture should be avoiding the copy past (new design).6. reshaping any field.7. minimize number color.8. Beautiful background, photography, others optimize the use of bold colors, typography, extra-large icons and white space to make an impression with visitors.check the attachment and more details will be discussed later.Thank you
